00012 // ConfigManager
00013 class ConfigManager : public lsf::basic::Singleton<ConfigManager> {
00014 public:
00015     void SetGameConfig(conf::Game const& game_config) { GameConfigMerge(game_config); }
00016     void SetServerConfig(conf::Server const& server_config) { _server_config.CopyFrom(server_config); }
00017     conf::Game   const& GameConfig() const { return _game_config; }
00018     conf::Server const& ServerConfig() const { return _server_config; }
00019 
00020     // test uid
00021     bool IsTest(uint64_t uid);
00022 
00023 private:
00024     void GameConfigMerge(conf::Game const& game_config);
00025 
00026 private:
00027     conf::Game   _game_config;
00028     conf::Server _server_config;
00029 };
